overview.en: AUG is a form of equity on AUG Cloud and a special asset that is symbiotic with the AUG Cloud system and part of the AUG Cloud protocol.The main purposes of AUG in the network are: 1. As a miner incentive, drive miners to participate in the provision of storage nodes, mining, to achieve the normal operation of the blockchain, and to ensure safety. 2. The user dynamically builds a station, and when the transfer is made, a certain amount of AUG will be consumed. 3. During the use of AUG Cloud, users need to rely on AUG as a distribution medium to circulate on the blockchain and consume a certain amount of AUG as the circulation cost. 4. A certain amount of AUG will be consumed when using other services provided by AUG Cloud.
overview.zh: AUG是AUG Cloud上的一种权益凭证，也是一种与AUG Cloud 系统共生的特殊资产，同时也是AUG Cloud 协议的一部分。AUG在网络里的主要用途为：1. 作为矿工激励，驱动矿工参与提供储存节点、挖矿，以实现区块链的正常运转，并保证安全。2.用户动态建站，转账时，将消耗一定量的AUG。3.用户使用AUG Cloud 过程中，需要依靠AUG作为流通媒介才能在区块链上流通，并消耗一定量的AUG作为流通成本。4.使用AUG Cloud 提供的其他服务时，将消耗一定量的AUG。
